MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G76 Postcode area of Glasgow. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown following reports of a fault on our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.38AM on 26th January 2021.
